About the Company: Precision Wires India Ltd (PWIL) is the largest manufacturer of Enamelled Copper Winding Wires in India.the product range of the company includes Enamelled Round Winding Wires- PWIL manufactures a wide range of Enamelled Round Winding Wires for use in electrical machines such as motors, generators, transformers, house hold appliances, auto-electricals, electrical hand tools, refrigeration (hermetic) motors, fans, switchgears, coils and relays, ballasts and etc.Rectangular Winding Wires- Enamelled, taped and CTC.
